description: Resume Card 3-Way Linking Parity Fix - Add Job Application link to Resume cards to achieve full bidirectional navigation parity with Cover Letter and Job Application cards

userStories.title: Display Job Application link on Resume card
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see a link to the associated Job Application on my Resume card so I can navigate the full application context from the Resume.
acceptanceCriteria: Resume card displays Job Application link (icon + text) when association exists
Link style matches existing links on Cover Letter and Job Application cards
Link navigates to /[locale]/dashboard/job-applications/[id]
Link appears when a Job Application is associated directly or indirectly (via Cover Letter)
No link appears when no Job Application is associated
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: JobLinkBadge renders when linkedJob is present. Direct and indirect associations both work.

userStories.title: Preserve existing Cover Letter link on Resume card
userStories.description: As a user, I want the existing Cover Letter link on the Resume card to continue working exactly as before.
acceptanceCriteria: Cover Letter link remains visible when associated
Cover Letter link navigates to correct URL
No visual or functional regression from previous behavior
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Cover Letter link preserved via linkedCoverLetterIds prop.

userStories.title: Enforce automatic 3-way linking consistency
userStories.description: As a system, I want relationships between Resume, Cover Letter, and Job Application to be transitive and consistently visible across all cards.
acceptanceCriteria: If Resume ↔ Cover Letter exists AND Cover Letter ↔ Job Application exists, then Resume ↔ Job Application link is visible
Resume card reflects all existing associations without manual user action
No duplicate links are rendered
Linking logic is deterministic and centralized (not scattered across components)
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
userStories.notes: Transitive linking implemented via indirectJobIdMap. Direct association takes priority. First cover letter wins for indirect.

userStories.title: Verify linking parity across all locales
userStories.description: As a user in any supported locale, I want Resume card links to work correctly regardless of language.
acceptanceCriteria: Links work in /fr/dashboard/
Links work in /de/dashboard/
Links work in /en/dashboard/
Links work in /it/dashboard/
Link labels are properly translated (if applicable)
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: All links use /${locale}/dashboard/... pattern. JobLinkBadge generates locale-aware URLs.
